Give it a try! Construct a search on your topic using: OR to join synonymsAND to join major conceptsasterisks to find multiple endings"quotes" to find phrases
Add a * to find multiple endings (e.g., emotion* finds emotion, emotions, emotional, ….)
Construct a powerful search.
Use “quotes” to find entire phrases.
empath* OR emotion* OR "social intelligence"
crow* OR raven* OR rook* OR corv*
